After that, Rosalina is now bigger then me and I'm smaller then her, then she reach her hand out, I was to scare to move and Rosalina grabbed me, I don't know what is she going to do to me, she was just giving me a pat on my head of gentle giantess. 1113121.title: Breasts

112.content:
"I'm so bored!" Recently you had been grounded for a couple weeks
because you had managed to get a F on your last report card, you
can't say that you didn't deserve it because in the back of your mind
you knew it was true, but you still had a right to complain about it!
You were confined to your room for an entire week as punishment,
only being allowed to come out for food and to go to school, but when
you weren't doing either of those things, you had to be in your room,
it wasn't all that bad for the first two days because you were pretty
creative and came up with your own fun, but you were running out of
things to occupy yourself with while you waited for the week to just be
over with. "I guess I'll just take a nap then," you mutter to yourself,
as your drifted off slowly to sleep, you could've sworn that you heard
something coming from your closet, but you paid it no mind, letting
the darkness take over your field of vision.

The dream you had once one of complete wonder, first you were
flying high above the world! Then, since you had become a master of
lucid dreaming, you decided to pay a visit to your favorite place in your
dream world, Sonic Land. You had always been a huge fan of Sonic the
Hedgehog and (not that you would ever admit it to anyone other than
yourself) had a bit of a crush on all of the Sonic girls. You didn't know
what it was that attracted you to any of them (With the exception of the
busty bat-girl, Rouge) but you knew you loved them, especially when they
were towering over you.

Soon you found the world becoming more and more unstable as you
knew what was happening next, you were waking up. As you slowly opened
your eyes, you realize that it was extremely dark and warm in your room,
but you noticed that something was off, it was pitch black and the blinds on
your window were drawn up and streetlamp light always flowed into your room
at night, nothing about this added up at all. You went to get up and found that
you couldn't. As you tried getting up off your bed you felt a weight lifted off of you,
as light poured all around you. You looked up into the face of:
112.title: Sonic Girls

141111.title: Found me shrunk

142.content: Which girl are you shrunk with?
142.title: Sonic the Hedgehog

1421.content: You are an aspiring martial artist with over twelve years of martial arts experience at your disposal. You've been training since you were a young boy and your skills are second to none, well, except your master of course. You are known as the kicking demon and for good reason, your kicks are deadly. You have a great physique which many of the female students drool over ;). However, your attitude could use some work. You are cocky, arrogant, and prideful and it really shows when you fight. Your master continues to lecture you on a daily basis about the importance of humility, but you always brush it off as nothing more than jealousy on his part. Today you find yourself teaching class in your master's place due to him being out of town on business. After several grueling hours of training you lock up for the night and begin your walk home. You are about halfway home when you notice a shining pink aura in the sky. Not too far from where you are actually. The question is do you run towards it, or go home?
1421.title: Amy Rose

14211.content:
You find yourself drawn to the pink aura. You eagerly run towards in an effort to see what it could possibly be. As you get closer

however it explodes. You stand firm in the face of the explosion however, thanks to your years of training. As the explosion

decepates you see three figures shining in the moonlight. You carefully and quietly make your way closer to the three figures in

question. All the while making sure you stay unnoticed. You were about 20 feet away when you could make out who the three

figures were. One of them looked to be an older, robust man with a red moustache in some sort of hovering machine. The one

standing next to him looked like some sort of 10 foot tall robot with missiles for hands. 'WOW! Never seen that kind of technology

before' you think to yourself. Then you make the final figure to left of the other two. It looked a lot smaller than the others. What

you saw made your jaw drop. 'Is that.....Amy....AMY ROSE!?!?!' Sure enough as you make out the details of her figure, you

confirm that that is indeed her. You are completely baffled. 'How can this be possible'?!?! You think to yourself. Your thoughts are

interrupted as you hear the man, who you now recognize as Dr. Robotnik, speak. "Come now Ms. Rose, simply comply with my

demands and no harm will come to you". "NO WAY"! I'm not going anywhere with you Egghead"! Said Amy. This made you

chuckle slightly. However, the laughter stopped when you saw the robot arm it's missiles. "Very well then..." said the Doctor "If

you won't go with me willingly, I'll simply take you by force"! The robot aimed it's missiles at Amy! What will you do? (Don't worry

we will get to the freakin shrinking)
14211.title: Run towards it

142111.content:
You decide that you've seen enough. Just as the Doctor says "Fire"! You run headstrong into the line of fire grabbing Amy and

narrowly avoiding the missiles. You do a fancy tuck n' roll with Amy in tote, popping back into a standing position with Amy in the

bridal position. "Are you okay"? you say. "Um, yeah...thanks but...who are you"? "That's not important at the moment" you say.

You then stare angrily at Robotnik, "What is important is that I teach fatass here how to properly treat a lady"! you say as you

crack your knuckles. Robotnik merely laughs hardily at your threat, not thinking much of this brash stranger that seems to have

appeared out of nowhere. At this point the robot targets you and prepares to attack. Then you in return throw off you Gi top (The

top of your martial arts uniform) in dramatic fashion revealing your strong physique, preparing for battle yourself. Seeing your

chizzled features Amy's eyes go wide 'Holy crap! Why doesn't Sonic look like that'? She thinks to herself. She than notices the

robot poised to attack, "Be careful"! She says. You turn to her giving her a thumbs up in reassurance and turn back to face the

Doctor. "You really don't want to do this boy" says the Doctor. "Oh yes" you say while taking a fighting stance, "I really do".
142111.title: Confront the Doctor

1421111.content:
Both you and the robot are poised for battle. Then the doctor says "Attack"! The robot fires it's missiles at you. You quickly avoid

and evade both missiles with ease. Then charge straight for the robot and before it has time to reload you jump headlong straight

at the robot. You connect with a dynamic kick straight to the robots head causing to cave in an in turn the robot collapsed with a

loud 'THUD'! on the hard ground. "Grrrrr....CURSE YOU"! says the Doctor, all the while gritting his teeth. "HA"! You say in

replay "Is that the best you can do? PATHETIC"! 'Geez, he's a cocky guy isn't he'? Amy thought to herself 'Pretty cute though'

she thought as she blushed. "Oh no you arrogant boy, I still have my secret weapon"! Said the Doctor as he flipped a switch in

his hovering vehicle, making a button appear on the dash. At the same time a lazer pointed itself at Amy. The Doctor smiled

diabolically as he went to press the button. Using your keen reflexes you rush to Amy's aid. Just as the Doctor was about to press

the button, his broken robot short circuited and exploded. Causing Robotnik to flinch and accidently press the wrong button. A

purple lazer shot out from the hovering vehicle straight at Amy. However, you jumped in front of Amy just before the blast

connected. You held her in your arms on protective instinct as the blast enveloped the both of you. At this point Robotnik

regained his composure and saw that he had pressed the "shrink" button by accident. He looked on in amazement as you and

Amy both began to shrink. How small do you both become?
1421111.title: FIGHT!

14211112.content:
The light emmiting from the lazer blinded Robotnik as both you and Amy began to reduce in size. The both of you looked up in

shock as the world around you grew larger nad larger until the grass itself was twice your size. Even in this most drastic of

circumstances you manage to keep a cool head. Amy on the other hand is shaken to say the least. She's about to scream when

you put your hand over her mouth and putting a finger to your lips giving her the signaal to stay quiet. It's at this time that the light

from the lazer has fully faded and the Doctor has regained his vision. He looks all over the grassy field where he exected the two

of you to be. But thanks to your level-headedness and Amy's cooperation he doesn't find you. After half an hour of searching he

throws his hands up in defeat saying "Fine then, it makes no difference. This is but a small hitch in my plan....Besides, they'll

most likely end up a part of the food chain before the night through anyway. MWHAHAHAHA!!!" He laughed meniacly as he

floated away in his hover car. Both you and Amy breath a sigh of relief and fall back onto the soft earth. You prop yourself up

and ask "Are you alright Ms. Rose" "Yes but, how do you know my name"? 'Oh crap'! you think 'Should I be truthful and tell her

she's nothing more than a video game character, or save her feelings and possibly her fragile little psyche'?
14211112.title: 1 inch

142111122.content:
You tell her "Um I heard that fat guy call you 'Ms. Rose' " (Which is true) "Oh, I guess that makes sense". She says as she

begins to look around the newly enlarged world that encompassed the both of you. You sigh in relief 'I might want to wait to tell

her something so devastating, from the looks of it we already have enough to deal with' you think to yourself. "So what are we

gonna do now"? Said a very nervous Amy. You think for a moment, "Well, the way I see it we have two options. We can either

try to hoof it back to my place, or try to make some sort of make-shift camp site here. It's up to you" you reply. "Hmmm..." says

Amy thinking to herself. "I think we should...
142111122.title: Lie (Sort of)

1421111221.content: Head to your place". said Amy. "Yes, I suppose that's a better idea than leaving ourselves vulnerable to the elements" you say. You extend your hand to her to offer to help her up "Shall we get going" you say. Slightly blushing Amy grabs your hand and you pull her to her feet. "Okay" she says as she smiles at you. As the two of you begin your trek she starts making conversation with you. "Thank you for saving me back there, that was very brave" she says. You reply "It's no problem, I only do what I feel is right and that guy obviously had it coming....I am sorry I didn't stop him from shrinking us." "Don't worry about it, there was nothing you could do. Eggman's just sneaky like that, besides, I'm sure we'll figure something out" she says. "Well you seem pretty confident about that....and what makes you so sure"? You ask. "This isn't the worst situation I've found myself in, don't sweat it things always seem to work out" she replies. This brings a small but noticable smile to your face "I sure hope so" you say. "But enough about all that, I'm more interested in you". she says as she lightly pokes you on your rock hard chest. "OH" you say nervously while blushing slightly. "How so"? "ALL THOSE FANCY MOVES OF YOURS WERE SO COOL"! She exclaims. "Oh....heh heh....really"? you inquire while lightly scratching your cheek. "YEAH"! She replies while moving closer to you, so close in fact that your noses were almost touching "How did you do all that"? She inquires, eyes sparkling in the moon light. 'Gee' you think to yourself 'now that I see her up close, she really is pretty cute'. You then shake your head realizing she still waiting for a response. "Well you see Ms. Rose-" "Just call me Amy" she interrupts, Ms. Rose just sounds too formal". "Alright then Amy" you say with a smile "I've been training in the ways of....." You go on to tell her about your martial arts training and years of combat experience. She finds all this fascinating and decides to share more about herself with you. Including descriptions of Mobius and all of her friends and the fun times they've shared. You both got to know each other fairly well as you both made your way to your house. "Here we are" you say "Home sweet home". You both manage to squeeze under the door considering your current predicament. "Wow, your house sure is pretty" says Amy. "Thanks" you reply "What do you want to do now"? Asked Amy.
1421111221.title: Head to your place

14211112212.content:
*YAWN* "I am pretty tired" you say "Why don't we get some sleep and try to figure this out in the morning"? "Yeah, I'm pretty

tired myself now that you mention it" replied Amy. "But where are we gonna sleep"? She asks. You ponder this for a moment,

then you notice your nearby couch and say "There" you say as you point to the couch. "How are we gonna get up there"? she

asks. "You let me worry about that" you say as you point to your back and motion for her to get on. "Okay" she says with a smile

as she hops on. You make the trip to the top of the couch with little effort, however, when you get there you notice that Amy has

fallen asleep. This causes you to smile as you lay her down gently face up. She seems to be smiling contently as she

sleeps. 'She must be having a pretty good dream' you think to yourself. You cover her up with your Gi top and she pull it in tightly

and snugly. This makes you chuckle slightly. 'I don't think I've ever met a girl as carefree as her' you continue to think. You then

place a gentle kiss on her forehead saying oh so quietly "Good night Amy". Then making yourself comfortable next to her and

falling into a deep sleep yourself.
14211112212.title: I'm pretty tired

142111122121.content:
The next morning you groggily wake yourself up, however, as you do so something feels strange. What you are laying on feels strange. It certainly doesn't feel like the fabric of your couch. You hesitantly turn to look at what it is you are feeling and to your surprise it was a red cotton like substance. As you stand up on it to get a better look you fully realize what it is you are standing on. You look towards one end of the couch seeing a giant pair of pink legs, then down the other to see the face of the girl you had just tucked in last night still sound asleep. 'Amy's back to her normal size?!?!' you think. 'But how'? you ponder. "I suppose the affects of that lazer were temporary" you say to yourself. "But then why haven't I returned to normal size"? you question yourself. 'Perhaps it's the differences in our genetic structure' you hypothesize. 'In any case I'll have to figure that out later, right now I need to wake up Amy and get her attention so we can figure out what's going on".
============================================================================ =================

*Meanwhile back at the park from last night*

A green light starts to shine with crackling sound effects. It looks like a lazer light show of sorts. Noone is aound to notice it thankfully as a final warping sound is made four figures appear from the light. Tails the fox, Sonic and Shadow the two hedgehogs, and Knuckles the echidnian. "I don't see the Doctor anywhere" said Shadow. "I don't see Amy anywhere either" said Sonic. "Hmmm" said Sonic as he took a quick look around. "Look guys"! exclaimed Tails. They all walked over to Tails and immediately recognizing what it was Tails was pointing at. "It's Eggman's robot"! exclaimed Knuckles recognizing the now broken hunks of metal that use to be Eggman's robot. "Are you telling me AMY did this" said Shadow. "There's no way" said Knuckles. Whoever did this would have to be atleast as strong as me, this is reenforced steel". "Whoever did it is no slouch that's for sure" said Sonic. "Let's worry about that later right now we need to focus on finding Amy and Eggman" said Tails. "Tails is right" said Knuckles "But I think we need to split up so we can cover more distance". "Sounds good but what if we lose each other"? Said Sonic. "Don't worry about that. You go with Shadow and I'll go with Tails. That way I'll be able to sense Shadow's Chaos Emerald and find you guys". "Sounds good" said Sonic. "Cool, we'll go this way and you guys head that way". "Alright, later" said Tails. Let's go Shadow" said Sonic. "Don't think you can tell me what do faker"! Exclaimed Shadow. "Ugh"! Said Sonic as he slapped his forehead.
142111122121.title: The next morning

1421111221211.content: You begin your walk up Amy's stomach, which is very smooth to say the least. Until you are met by her two very beluptuous breasts that block you way to her head. 'WOW'! You think to yourself 'I never realized she was THIS well endowed'. You climb to the top of her left breast and pull yourself on top with a *PLOP* making Amy moan slightly. 'Hmm, she IS a woman after all' you thought. Then you slide down the other side of her breast and are now at the base of her neck close to her chin. You gaze in amazement at how much larger her head is close up. You notice that she is breathing deeply through her mouth. You can see all the details within her cavernous maw, you can even see all the way to the back of her throat. 'I'd better keep my distance, I do NOT wanna end up in there' you think. 'She'll probably hear me from here'. You suck in as much air as you can and yell "AMY"!!! Does she hear you?
1421111221211.title: Back at your place

14211112212111.content: Yes, she did hear you. Unfortunately you think you might've been a tad bit too loud as her eyes shoot open and her upper body quickly rises up sending you flying and tumbling all the way down her dress and legs. You tumble all the way down the couch until you hit something with a *THUD*. You open your eyes to see that the room is a lot darker than you remember. There is a light at the end of a tunnel and with that light you can make out that you appear to be sitting on a large pink column. "Uh oh" you say out loud as you turn around to confirm your suspicions and unfortunately for you, you were right about your current location. As you looked behind you, you saw a large pink fleshy wall that towered over you and at the top of the wall were five big round pretty pink digits that were Amy's toes. You looked back towards the light and think 'I'm in Amy's BOOT'! Your thoughts are quickly interrupted as Amy brings her boot clad feet to the floor and stretches her arms out as she yawns. During all this activity you are shaken about like a rag doll and when the motion finally stopped you felt a small pressure on top of you. As you looked up you were greeted by the bottom of Amy's cute sole. Being this close to her sole you can make out all the details in the wrinkles within her foot. It's at this point that you are greeted by the combined smell of foot odor and leather. Granted the smell was not as bad as it could have been, it was still quite pungent for someone of your size. While you are trying to free yourself from the confines of the boot prison and the foot that accompanied you, Amy is now realizing she is back to her normal size. "WHEW" she sighs "That's a relief, but I could of sworn I heard (Your name here) calling me. She looks around the room but you are nowhere to be found. It's at this point she feels a slight tickling sensation coming from her right boot. As she pulls her boot clad foot closer she begins to make out your muffled cries. "OH CRAP" she says as she quickly removes her boot and looks inside for you. However, you aren't in the boot. She then looks over to her foot to see your tiny frame plastered face down to the instep of her sole. She quickly peels you off and gently places you in the palm of her hand. "Oh my gosh"! She exclaims. "Are you okay"? "Yeah, never *cough* better" you reply. "I am SO sorry" she says with a guilty look on her face. "It's no problem" you say "I've taken a lot worse punishment than that, besides, it's my fault, I'm the one who startled you" you say with a small smile. "Well, okay if you say so" she says while giggling. She was just glad to see that you were alright....
14211112212111.title: Yes

142111122121112.content: "Hey Amy" you say. "Um no offense, but I think your foot did a number on my personal hygiene. Would you mind taking me to the shower so I can clean up"? you ask. "None taken" Amy replies giggling at your predicament. "My feet do stink a little I suppose". She then pauses for a moment sniffing her underarm then quickly pulls her head back with a cringe. "Whew, it isn't just my feet, I reek" she says. "I think I'll join you". "WHAT"! you exclaim while taking a step back. "What's the matter, you nervous"? She says in a softer tone than before as she brings you closer to her face. Your face is now beet red as you stutter "N-no I j-just ummm....." You are looking down at this point nervously twittling with your fingers. "Hey" she says, making you look up at her directly in her eyes. Which by this time you are hypnotized by. "It's okay, I dont mind" she says reassuring you. You pause for a moment looking at her more intensely. "Hey, are you okay"? she asks tilting her head in bewilderment. "What are you staring at me like that for"? You snap back to reality, stammering for a moment. "O-oh it's nothing....and thank you" you say smiling back at her. "Alright then, shall we"? You nod your head in agreement. As she walks to the bathroom you begin to think to yourself 'Am I becoming attracted to this girl'?.....
142111122121112.title: Shower

choices: Of course I'll rub your feet
No thanks, I've had enough foot action for one day

You then see her in nothing but her bra and panties which had little hearts on them. She began to undo her bra and you quickly put your hands over your eyes while blushing intensely. She turns to you and sees this. "Aw c'mon, don't be such a fuddy duddy. You're gonna hurt my feelings" she says with a fake pouty face. "Hehe" she giggles as you continue to stare "Like what you see"? she inquires in a seductive tone. You remain silent for a moment, until you say "Y-your.....beautiful" in the most sincere of tones. 'Am I falling for this man'. The shower continues and neither of you say much as you are focused on washing off all the spit from your previous kiss, which was rather enjoyable now that you think about it. Amy on the other hand has something else on her mind. She's thinking back to when you were trapped under her foot in her boot and how it felt. 'Now that I think about that did feel really...good...' she thought to herself. She then squats down toward you and poses a somewhat intimate question. "Hey (Your name)". "Yeah" you reply. "Do you you remember when you were trapped under my foot"? She asks. "Of course, how could I forget" you say somewhat sarcastically, smiling up at her. "Yeah well um, I was wondering. It did feel kinda good feeling you move around under my foot like that and all". "Yeeaahhh and..." you reply thinking 'I don't think I like where this heading'. "And my feet don't stink anymore or anything, and I was just wondering...." she said as she nervously rubbed the back of her head. "If you would um....rub them for me.....my feet I mean"? She asked turning away from you while her face turned a bright red. You think for a moment 'Hmmm....'
1421111221211121.title: In the shower....

choices: You grow back to your normal size
14211112212111211.content: "Oh, is that all"? you ask "Of course, I'll be more than happy to rub your feet for you. They are probably aching after that long walk we had to take to get here yesterday" you say chuckling slightly. "Yeah, kinda". She replies. "You really don't mind"? she asks. "Not at all" you say, giving her the same thumbs up of reassurance you did last night with a big grin on your face. "Great! Thanks a lot" she says as she sits at one end of the shower, warm water still running. "You know, for a second there I thought you were gonna smother me with your feet or something" you say rubbing the back of your head. "Nah, I'll save that for another time" she says winking at you. She props her feet in front of you when you notice something. You are half the size of her foot now when just this morning you were no bigger than her big toe. 'The affects of the shrink ray must finally be wearing off' you think to yourself. Amy interrupts your train of thought when she says "I'm waiting" in a mock irritated tone with her arms crossed and a fake pouty face. "Sorry about that" you reply as you get started. You start by lightly rubbing her heel first and gradually increase the pressure over the next few minutes. You slowly work your way up to the arch of her sole which is soft and smooth to the touch. You can tell that she is enjoying the treatment due to the fact that she continues to give out little moans every now and again. "This feels incredible" she says "Please don't stop". "Don't worry, I'm just getting started" you say. You make your way to the ball of her foot which for some reason isn't as hard to reach as it was a few seconds ago. After a few minutes of rubbing the ball of her foot you rub each of her toes individually starting from smallest to biggest. At this point you are really getting into this just as much as she is. Amy continues to moan louder and louder as your rubbing becomes more and more intensified. You are rubbing her big toe when she lets out the biggest moan yet, which pushes you over the edge. You give her big toe a long passionate kiss. She notices this and says "That felt amazing, keep doing that" as she pushes her feet closer to your face. You've never been one to deny a pretty girl, so you continue planting kisses all over her feet. That is until you start getting a tingling sensation all over your body. She notices that you've stopped and asks "What's wrong"? "I have a bad feeling about this" you say as you fall to one knee while holding your head.
14211112212111211.title: Of course I'll rub your feet

142111122121112111.content: Amy is still in her sitting position in the shower staring at you with a look of great concern on her face. You suddenly find yourself growing at a rapid rate which causes you to be quite alarmed considering your concern for Amy's safety. The growing however, seemed to stop just as quickly as it began. Both you and Amy cautiously open your eyes to see that you are now laying right on top of her face to face with her in the still running shower. You both stare at each other for a moment when you finally speak up. "Um, I think the shrink rays affects finally wore off, heh heh". you say meekly as you smile at her. "You think"? she says sarcastically. You both just continue to stare at each other intimately gazing deeply into each other's eyes. You both keep leaning in closer and closer to each other. Your lips are about to make contact when you hear a loud grumbling sound. You pause to look at Amy who is now blushing slightly. "Sorry, guess I'm a little hungry" she says turning her head slightly embarrased. "Hey" you say in reply as you grab her chin to turn her head back in your direction. "I can fix that" you say as you lean in and give Amy a long, deep, passionate kiss. At first she is taken by surprise but soon starts kissing back just as passionately as you. After a minute or two you both pull away and you say "How about I do something about that hunger of yours" Amy looks at you with a content smile and replies "Sounds good to me".
142111122121112111.title: You grow back to your normal size

1421111221211121111.content:
[At this point in the story, instead of putting (your name here) everytime I need to reference the character by name, I'm just going to refer to him as "Ryan" please enjoy the rest of the interactive]
============================================================================ ==================

Both you and Amy exit the shower and get yoursleves dressed as you head to the kitchen. She takes a seat at the table as you begin preparing breakfast. As you make breakfast you initiate conversation. "So Amy, do you have any idea what that Eggman guy was on about last night"? You inquire. "What do you mean"? Asks Amy. "You know, he was spouting off something about "plans" as he floated away" you reply. "Oh, no I have no idea". "Hmmm" you think out loud. "And you say you have no idea how you and Eggman got here"? You ask. "Not a clue" she responds. "I remember following Sonic as he was chasing after Eggman, but then I got lost and accidentally found Eggman. I snuck up on him from behind, but as I got closer he pressed some button and the next thing I know I'm in this world" says Amy. "I wish I could figure this out but all this scientific stuff isn't really my bag" you say in reply. "Yeah, I wish Tails were here" says Amy "He could figure it out for sure". You finish making breakfast and hand Amy a plate of seasoned scrambled eggs and bacon with buttered toast. "Wow, this looks really good" she says complimenting you. "Thanks, I'm studying cullinary part time". You reply. You both begin to eat as something catches your eye. You can see into the living room from the kitchen and out of the living room window you see two figures peering inside. As you look closer they pull away from the window. "Hey Amy" you say. "Hmmm"? she asks with her mouth full. "Did anything else get transported here with you when you got here"? *GULP* "No, why"? she inquires. 'In any case I don't like the looks of that' you think to yourslef. You stand up and quickly walk to the closet and grab the katana you keep in it. *SCHWIIING* says the blade as you pull it from it's sheath. "What's wrong"? asks Amy. "Here take this and use to protect yourself. I'm fixing to go outside to confront something that's been watching us" you reply. "If anything but me comes back in the house I want you to do whatever you have to in order to protect yourself, do you understand"? you ask. "I'm coming with you" she says. "No, I don't know whats out there and I don't want you to get hurt. Stay here" you say. "No matter what you hear, don't come out until I say it's ok got it"? you ask. "Okay" she says nervously in reply. "Hey, don't worry" you say as you pull her in for a quick kiss "I'll be fine" you finish. "Be careful Ryan" she says in concern. You turn to her and again give her a thumbs up of reassurance as you walk out the front door.
1421111221211121111.title: Time to eat

14211112212111211111.content:
You walk out into the front yard and say “Whoever is out here come on out, I know you're here”. As

you say this the two figures from earlier make their way out from behind the bushes in front of your

house. “Looks like the jigs up Shadz” said Sonic. “I didn't even want to hide in the first place faker”

replied Shadow. “Sonic and Shadow huh”? You say. “I thought someone else might have come to this

world after Amy and the Doctor showed up” you say. “What”? Inquires Sonic. “You know Amy?

Where is she, and how do you know our names”? “Isn't it obvious”? Replies Shadow. “He must work

for the Doctor. Where is he”?! He demands. “I don't know” you say. “LIAR”! He says as he charges at

you *THOOM* he lands a punch right in your face and you fall to the ground. “Now tell me what I want

to know and let you off easy” he says threateningly. “I'm telling you I don't know where he is, just let

me explain” you plead. “Shadz! You can't just go around hitting people just because they're not telling

you what you want to hear”! Sonic exclaims.”SHUT IT FAKER”! Shadow replies “I don't remember

putting you in charge of this operation. It's clear to me now that the only way I'm gonna get the

information out of you is to BEAT it out of you”! He exclaims as he jumps up into the air to land a hard

kick. You jump and roll out the way taking a defensive stance as Shadow continues his assault. He

throws a punch which you block. 'What'! He thinks to himself. He continues to throw punch and kick

combinations that you also block. “That's IT”! You exclaim *THWACK* you connect with a punch

straight to Shadow's jaw, sending him flying back and crashing into your mail box. “Uhhh” he says as

he rubs his jaw “What the hell”? He inquires. 'What kind of human has THAT kind of strength' Sonic

asks himself. “Wait a second” he says to himself “Shadz, this might be the same guy that blew up

Eggman's robot”. “You mean that hunk of junk that first showed up with the Doctor”? You ask “Yeah, I

took that thing down without even breaking a sweat”. At this point Amy has heard all the commotion

and goes to the living and looks out the window to see you, Sonic, and Shadow on the front lawn. She

quickly runs to the front door flinging it open. “Sonic, you're here”! She exclaims happily. “Amy”!

Sonic replies. “I'm glad to see you're okay”. Shadow has gotten up and pulled himself together at this

time and walks over to you. “This is all fine and good, but tell me something”. He says “How does a

mere human get such great strength”? “Lets not have this conversation on the lawn please” you

reply “Lets all go inside and I'll explain everything”. “Very well” says Shadow as you all walk inside.
14211112212111211111.title: Two hedgehogs and a confrontation
